articles.content: June 9 - 1st T20I, DelhiJune 12 - 2nd T20I, Cuttack June 14 - 3rd T20I, VisakhapatnamJune 17 - 4th T20I, RajkotJune 19 - 5th T20I, Bengaluru

articles.title: Mustafizur will have to play Test cricket if needed - BCB boss | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: The left-arm pacer had recently insisted that he is not ready to return to Test cricket, and that picking and choosing formats was important for him in order to prolong his career
articles.content:
BCB president Nazmul Hasan said Mustafizur Rahman will have to play Test cricket if he is required by the team © BCB
